cu.explanation_en: Setting the NG AMF IP address to an invalid format will cause AMF connection failure and prevent NG interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting do SRS to an invalid value (2) will cause SRS configuration errors and prevent proper sounding reference signal transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 do SRS 設定為無效值 (2)，會導致 SRS 配置錯誤，並阻止正確的探測參考訊號傳輸。
